name: EHR-prototyping
body:
### Welcome to Region Östergötland's EHR-prototyping experiments
We are exploring openEHR-based prototyping of EHR (Electronic Health Record) applications. 

The focus of our current experiment is on emergency care, where today a mix of paper-based and electronic health record notes are used.

In the initial experiments we are using the [EhrScape](https://www.ehrscape.com/) platform combined with our own code, but hope to be able to test also other platforms. 

###  Contact
If you need more info contact @ErikSundvall
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
